title: Did a Struggling Sylvester Stallone Sell His Dog for $25?
subtitle: Sly reportedly sold his dog for $25 to make ends meet before hitting it big with 'Rocky,' then bought it back for $15,000.
author: Dan Evon
vclaim: Sylvester Stallone sold his dog for $25 to make ends meet before hitting it big with Rocky, then bought it back for $15,000.
